context_of_use: This use case allows an admin to view sales performance reports and analytics to monitor business metrics.
description: This use case enables admins to view sales reports to analyze business performance.
triggering_event: Admin requests to view sales reports.
preconditions: Admin has permission to view sales reports.
postconditions: Admin successfully views the sales reports.
assumptions: The admin has a valid account.
The system has up-to-date sales data.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to view sales reports.
The system shall authenticate admins before accessing reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on report formats and data granularity.
main_flow: 1. Admin requests to view sales reports → System authenticates the admin.
2. Admin is authenticated → System retrieves sales reports.
3. Admin views sales reports → System displays the sales performance reports.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the admin is not authenticated, the system prompts for login credentials.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the system fails to retrieve sales reports, the system displays an error message.
